patterns.name: Form Patterns
patterns.description: Validation, multi-step forms, inline editing, and field grouping.
guidelines: Always validate on blur and on submit
Show inline error messages below the field
Use disabled submit buttons only after first submission attempt
Mark required fields with an asterisk

patterns.name: Layout Patterns
patterns.description: Page layouts including dashboard, landing, auth, sidebar, split, and master-detail.
guidelines: Use sticky positioning for sidebars and headers
Content area should be scrollable independently

patterns.name: Content States
patterns.description: Empty states, loading states, error states, success feedback, and onboarding flows.
guidelines: Empty states should include an action to resolve the state
Use skeleton loaders that match content shape
Error states should offer retry actions
Success states should auto-dismiss or provide next steps

patterns.name: Data Patterns
patterns.description: Data tables with sorting/filtering, list views, card grids, and pagination.
guidelines: Tables should be horizontally scrollable on mobile
Provide both table and card views for data-heavy pages
Show loading states during data fetching
